document.full_text: china's minmetals resources bowed out of the battle for copper miner equinox minerals on tuesday, saying barrick gold corp's c$7.3 billion ($7.7 billion) bid was too rich to justify a counter-offer.
document.title: china's minmetals bows out to barrick gold's $7.7 billion bid
lines_and_colors: china's minmetals resources bowed out of the battle for copper miner equinox minerals on tuesday, saying barrick gold corp's c$7.3 billion ($7.7 billion) bid was too rich to justify a counter-offer.
